text: Hey there! 👋 I'm thrilled to hear about PGIMER specialists backing preventive health care! 🙌 It's amazing to see doctors from different departments engaging with the community and providing valuable information on disease prevention and timely medical care. 💡 This initiative will not only improve health outcomes but also alleviate financial strain on patients and the institution. 💰🏥 Kudos to PGI director Prof Vivek Lal for emphasizing the importance of educational outreach! 👏 The department of nephrology leading the way by sending doctors to rural centres is fantastic! 🌟 Can't wait to see more departments following suit. Let's work together to prioritize preventive health care and make a difference in people's lives! 💪🏽
